commit_message:
feat(specks-core): add worktree core module

Implement worktree lifecycle management with:
- WorktreeConfig struct and derive_speck_slug (Spec S05)
- sanitize_branch_name per D08 specification
- GitCli wrapper for git operations (-C flag pattern)
- create_worktree with partial failure recovery
- list_worktrees with pruning and orphan handling
- cleanup_worktrees with git-native merge detection (D09)
- Error variants E028-E034 with exit codes per Table T02
warnings: Manual policy: staged files only, awaiting user commit
